meanings.sent1: Stop talking bolloxes and focus on the task at hand.

meanings.sent3: His excuse was such bolloxes that we couldn't help but laugh.

meanings.definition: to mess up or make a mistake
meanings.sent1: I always bolloxes up the recipe when I try to cook.

meanings.sent5: The comedian intentionally bolloxes his lines for comedic effect.

meanings.sent1: He got hit in the bolloxes during the game and had to sit out.
